name: 3D Roll-A-Ball Boutoted
description:
3D Roll-A-Ball created utilizing Unity's Roll-A-Ball tutorial. 

Currently, the game is played using the arrow keys. Once the game loads on the page you will need to click within the game window to get the arrow keys functioning. 

In order to win you need to gather up all the yellow cubes - a total of 12 pick ups.

I have added several modifications.

  • The green pill shaped objects are power ups; they'll double your speed which for some will make the game harder to play.
  • The red sphere shaped objects are death spheres; they'll slow you down by half which once a time limit is added will make the game a lot more challenging to play.
  • The random colored platforms are transporters; they'll randomly place you, the player, in a new location. 
  • The aqua sphere shaped objects activate ghost mode; they make you, the player, insubstantial - you'll go through all objects except the ground and walls.
